title: Why Verstappen's latest Suzuka win was different from all the rest
summary: While Max Verstappen winning at Suzuka is nothing new, his 2025 victory stood out from those previous, asMark Hughesexplains

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Max Verstappen achieve a notable victory at Suzuka that was highlighted for being different from his previous wins?
What is the name of the circuit where Max Verstappen secured his unique victory in 2025?
Max Verstappen is a driver for which Formula 1 team as of 2025?
